doc:
Lillian Roth https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lillian_Roth 0 Lillian Roth (December 13, 1910 – May 12, 1980) was an American singer and actress. Her life story was told in the 1955 film I'll Cry Tomorrow, in which she was portrayed by Susan Hayward, who was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Roth. Lillian_Roth ( December_13_,_1910 – May_12_,_1980 ) was an_American_singer_and_actress . Her_life_story was_told in the_1955_film I 'll_Cry Tomorrow , in which she was_portrayed by Susan_Hayward , who was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actress for her_performance as Roth .
